name: Merge Cube
description:
Merge Cube is a novel 2048 game, with 3D number cubes different new experiences, which can greatly stimulate your senses. Use your wisdom and strategy to merge to 2048 and bigger numbers, enjoy this 2048 number puzzle challenges now!

How to play:
1. Use your 3D cube to aim!
2. Shoot and hit cubes of the same color and number!
3. Merge the cubes to get 2048!

Download Merge Cube now and start challenging your 2048!
